title: textureDefinition
description: Materials describe how a feature or a set of features is to be rendered. This includes which shading and which colors to use. The following table provides the set of attributes and params for the `type`: `standard` material.

encoding.description: MIMEtype - The encoding/content type that is used by all images in this map

wrap.description: UV wrapping modes, from {none, repeat, mirror}.

atlas.description: TRUE if the Map represents a texture atlas.

uvSet.description: The name of the UV set to be used as texture coordinates.

channels.description: Indicates which channels are stored in which channel of this map. Possible values: h=brightness, r=red, g=green, b=blue, a=alpha, n=bump, d=displacement,etc.

images.description: An image is a binary resource, containing a single raster that can be used to texture a feature or symbol.
